author: ESEARCH R and D. R. Ort and Perry Moerland and E. Fiesler and I. Ubarretxena-Belandia
title: Multilayer Perceptrons for Optical Implementation
window: implementation. eXclusive OR (R OR) The training set consists of the boolean exclusive OR function. It is the classical example of a simple problem that is not linearly separable [12]. Sonar This data set was originally used by R. Gorman and T. Sejnowski in their study of the classification of sonar signals using a neural network. The task is to discriminate between sonar signals bounced off a metal
